content.description: Climb up on top of a boulder at the base of a hand crack that bisects the formation. Cut right onto the face, and up past 3 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor.
content.protection: Maybe a piece at the start if you wish.  3 QDs for the bolts.
content.location: This is the dark brown formation easily seen from the road with the crack up the middle of the formation.  Park on the main road and hike over and up to the formation.  It is west of Invisible Baby Jones/Roman Bath area, and east of Shave Your Bump.

content.description: This bolted face climb goes up a slab on a large boulder that face the road.
content.protection: 3 or 4 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location: On one of the large boulders. The route faces the road.

content.description: This route can be seen from the road and is southwest from the rock that has Love Nugget.  This is a prominent crack that.
content.location: Approximately 500 yards southwest of Love Nugget and 700 yards from the road.  Park at the first turnout east of the Split rock turn off on the north side of the road.    The approach will take less than ten minutes.

content.description: This is the easy hand crack that splits the formation.
content.location: Located on a formation that faces the road, in the SE Boulders area of Split Rocks

content.description: Climb up the left side of the formation, passing 2 bolts; one below the roof, and one over the roof.  Easy slab climbing over the roof leads to a 2 bolt beay/rappel station.
content.location: Located on the formation facing the road in the SE Boulders area of Split Rocks.

content.description: This traversing Dike is located in a hidden corridor in the SE Boulders Area of Split Rock.
content.location: Hidden is a corridor in the SE Boulders Area of Split Rocks.

content.description: Top rope climb goes up flakes and lie-back crags, then up a short face section to the "Babie's head" horn, and then up the anchor on Invisible Baby Jones.
content.protection: Top rope off a 2 bolt anchor. To get to this anchor, you have to climb Invisible Baby Jones (5.10+)
content.location: Located in a hidden corridor in the SE Boulders Area of Split Rocks.

content.description: This cool route has 4 or 5 bolts and goes up steep rock on small but positive holds to a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location: Located on the N. Face of one of the big boulders in this area.

content.description: This route is located about 100 yards to the right of Shave Your Bump (5.6) It starts out with a gritty hand and finger crack and ends with lieback climbing up a sean past 2 bolts. I was thinking about giving this climb a bomb, but the top part is sort of fun, and the climb wasn't horrible, so.....
content.protection: A Standard rack of smal to large cams...extra medium. Rap from 2 blt anchor on top.
content.location: As you drive off the main highway towards the Split Rocks parking, you will soon see some climbable rock on the right. This is where Shave Your Bump (5.6) About 100 yrds to the right is Eine Dicke Frau (5.9)

climbs.name: The Cracken
climbs.fa: Tucker Tech, Greg Epperson, Frank Bentwood, Will Cassalero, Peter, Rhesa Asbacher, Tricia

content.description: This is mostly a hand crack, in a hidden corridor in the SE Boulders area of Split Rock.  It faces North.
content.location: SE boulders are of Split Rock
